short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that lets you copy selected text along with the URL in a citation-friendly format for easy quoting.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can easily cite selected text and links. It is useful when you want to quote selected text in a blockquote while writing markdown.
